caption: Relating to changing the eligibility of certain persons to receive community supervision, including deferred adjudication community supervision.
summary: This bill amends the Code of Criminal Procedure to make illegal aliens ineligible for community supervision and deferred adjudication community supervision. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, it affects any non-citizens who entered the US without inspection or failed to maintain their legal immigration status, including Chinese nationals who may have overstayed their visas or entered illegally.
translation: 该法案修改刑事诉讼法，规定非法移民不得获得社区监督和延期判决社区监督。虽然并非专门针对中国移民，但该法案会影响所有未经检查入境或未能维持合法移民身份的非公民，包括可能签证逾期或非法入境的中国公民。
committees:
1. Criminal Justice Committee
2. Judiciary Committee
3. State Affairs Committee
